message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'm happy to negotiate if you have a different proposal.
You're starting strong, but I'm looking for a better deal!
Let's try a 50/50 split.  Inflation is starting to hit, so it's in both of our best interests to reach an agreement soon.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  Let's split it 40/60 to avoid losing more to inflation.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied with the split!
Let's make a deal.  I'm offering a 35/65 split.  We're losing a lot of money to inflation, and this is the best we can do to get something out of this.
